nodes.text: The Almera system was a star system located within the Inner Rim and the Northern Dependencies regions. It shared its name with the Pact of Almera, an 899 BBY treaty that recognized the independence of the world Thyrsus from the planetary confederation known as the Echani Command.
The Almera system was first mentioned in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square M-8.
